verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they turn <S%H7725><s%> and encamp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Migdol <S%H4024><s%> and the sea, <S%H3220><s%> over <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> Baalzephon: <S%H1189><s%> before <S%H5226><s%> it shall you encamp <S%H2583><s%> by the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

For Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> They are entangled <S%H943><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> has shut <S%H5462><s%> them in.

And I will harden <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> that he shall follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and I will be honored <S%H3513><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all his host; <S%H2428><s%> that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> And they did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> fled: <S%H1272><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and of his servants <S%H5650><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have we done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> that we have let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> from serving <S%H5647><s%> us?
And he made ready <S%H631><s%> his chariot, <S%H7393><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with him:

And he took <S%H3947><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H970><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and captains <S%H7991><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one of them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and he pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out with an high <S%H7311><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

But the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, all <S%H3605><s%> the horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and his horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and his army, <S%H2428><s%> and overtook <S%H5381><s%> them encamping <S%H2583><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Baalzephon. <S%H1189><s%>

And when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> drew near, <S%H7126><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> marched <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and they were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid: <S%H3372><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> out to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Because <S%H1115><s%> there were no <S%H369><s%> graves <S%H6913><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> have you taken <S%H3947><s%> us away to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness? <S%H4057><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H2063><s%> have you dealt <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H2063><s%> with us, to carry <S%H3318><s%> us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

Is not this <S%H2088><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> that we did tell <S%H1696><s%> you in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let us alone, <S%H2308><s%> that we may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians? <S%H4714><s%> For it had been better <S%H2896><s%> for us to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> than that we should die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> you not, stand <S%H3320><s%> still, and see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he will show <S%H6213><s%> to you to day: <S%H3117><s%> for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have seen <S%H7200><s%> to day, <S%H3117><s%> you shall see <S%H7200><s%> them again <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you, and you shall hold <S%H2790><s%> your peace. <S%H2790><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> cry <S%H6817><s%> you to me? speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they go <S%H5265><s%> forward: <S%H5265><s%>

But lift <S%H7311><s%> you up your rod, <S%H4294><s%> and stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and divide <S%H1234><s%> it: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> ground through <S%H8432><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And I, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will harden <S%H2388><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and they shall follow <S%H310><s%> them: and I will get <S%H3513><s%> me honor <S%H3513><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> his host, <S%H2428><s%> on his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and on his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I have gotten <S%H7408><s%> me honor <S%H3513><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> on his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and on his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them; and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> their face, and stood <S%H5975><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them:

And it came <S%H935><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and it was a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H2822><s%> to them, but it gave light <S%H216><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> to these: so that the one <S%H2088><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> not near <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H2088><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the night. <S%H3915><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> caused the sea <S%H3220><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> back by a strong <S%H5794><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that night, <S%H3915><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> dry <S%H2724><s%> land, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were divided. <S%H1234><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry <S%H3004><s%> ground: and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued, <S%H7291><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> in after <S%H310><s%> them to the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch <S%H821><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> to the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> through the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> and of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and troubled <S%H2000><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%>

And took <S%H5493><s%> off their chariot <S%H4818><s%> wheels, <S%H212><s%> that they drove <S%H5090><s%> them heavily: <S%H3517><s%> so that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let us flee <S%H5127><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fights <S%H3898><s%> for them against the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> may come <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> on the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> on their chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and on their horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> forth his hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his strength <S%H386><s%> when the morning <S%H1242><s%> appeared; <S%H6437><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> it; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H5287><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and the horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H2428><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; there remained <S%H7604><s%> not so <S%H5704><s%> much <S%H5704><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of them.

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

Thus the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> on the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore. <S%H8193><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> on the Egyptians: <S%H4714><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and believed <S%H539><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
